Text: A trick I've seen done elsewhere on this site is to do a partial list in the torrent description, then continue the list in the comments. It may take more than one comment for a lengthy list but it seems to work alright.

Christmas at Cold Comfort Farm seems to be making calibre hang for me -- possibly defective.

@nbrazil - no need for a list; just click on the 165 next to "Files" above. The list will appear as if by magic.
